meanings.definition: A person who uses a keyboard to input data or commands into a computer.
meanings.sent1: The keyboarders in the office type quickly on their keyboards.
meanings.sent2: Many keyboarders prefer ergonomic keyboards for comfort.
meanings.sent3: The keyboarders had a race to see who could type the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, keyboarders are like wizards casting spells with their keystrokes.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the sound of keyboarders typing away, creating a symphony of clicks.

meanings.sent1: The team of keyboarders won the typing competition.
meanings.sent2: We invited all the keyboarders to the computer club meeting.
meanings.sent3: The keyboarders gathered around the giant keyboard for a group photo.
meanings.sent4: The keyboarders marched in unison, their fingers dancing across the keys.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was full of keyboarders, each one focused on their own screen.
